message: Hi Bob, I suggest a fair 60-40 split in my favor since I'm affected by inflation while you're not. This way we both get a good value.
Hi Alice, let's split it 50-50. This way, we both get an equal share and can proceed without any loss from inflation on your side.

Bob, due to 20% inflation affecting my share, I need a larger portion to maintain fair value. A 65-35 split would give me about $52 in real value while you get $35. This is more equitable considering the inflation impact.
Alice, I understand the impact of inflation on you. Let's do a 55-45 split in your favor. This will slightly improve your real value while still being fair.
